title: Looking for a mentor
body:
I'm currently an unranked flex player, who's struggling to get their grips in pvp. I'd like to think I'm not completely rubbish mechanically, but my game knowledge has a long way to go. If anyone's willing to team up and give some pointers and just play some games, that'd be great.

Username: Thaura

replies.body:
Hey, i dont mind helping you out add me in game and we can discuss anything you are curious about understanding with more depth etc.
my in game name is Inorii Yuzuriha and i will try my best to help you understand the fundamentals of the game! :)

Thank you so much! I'd really appreciate any help you could give, and I'll try to keep up the best I can.

I'll send a friend request shortly.
